title: Bug 31627: Core dump when changing perspective after adding DBCS project
description:
Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver. : IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3
Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace
Description: Steps to recreate problem:
OB: After completing step 12, a workbench core dump occurs. Please refer to the attached 'cvsdefect.zip' for the error details.
EB: Clicking the 'Resource Perspective' icon at the shortcut bar should change the perspective successfully without causing a core dump.
SR: Create a project using DBCS characters.
Right-click on the project and select 'Team > Share project...'.
Choose 'Use project name as module name' and click 'Finish'.
Navigate to the Synchronize view and select the project.
Right-click on the project and select 'Add Version Control'.
Right-click on the project and choose 'Commit'.
Right-click on the project and select 'Delete' (Choose 'also delete contents under /workspace folder name').
Switch the perspective to CVS perspective.
Right-click on the DBCS project and select 'Check Out As Project'.
